pr_title: CI: Don't run 'Deploy Snapshots' or 'Release Test Build' in forks

timeline.bodyText:
Are you sure it will work at this level? I don't see it documented at the top level here: https://docs.github.com/en/free-pro-team@latest/actions/reference/workflow-syntax-for-github-actions
As far as I can see in the doc, it needs to be: jobs.<job_id>.if
timeline.author: gsmet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -3,7 +3,7 @@ name: Quarkus Deploy Snapshots
 on:
   schedule:
     - cron: '0 2 * * *'
-
+if: ${{ github.repository == 'quarkusio/quarkus' }}

replies.bodyText: Shoot, wrong level! Thanks for pointing that out.
replies.author: famod
